mark_help: Scan the QR code of the inventory item and get detailed information about it.
invent_help: Mark a new inventory item or re-mark an inventory item with a lost or damaged QR code.
accept_help: Just scan the QR code of the inventory item, the inventory report will be in the Administrative Panel.
service_help: Accept the inventory item in your report or transfer it to another employee.
write_off_help: Send the inventory items to or make a return from the service.
my_account: Scan the QR code of the inventory items if its further operation is not possible and it is subject to write-off.
not_now: View the inventory items assigned to you.
not_found: Limits has been exceeded. You can send a password reset request only once a minute
forgot_your_pass: We have successfully sent a link to reset your password
next: Enter your email and we will send you a link to reset your password
popup_limit_exceeded_body_worker: Inventory item quantity limit for your company has been exceeded. Contact the administrators or storekeepers of the group to change the tariff plan
popup_limit_exceeded_body_admin: Inventory item quantity limit for your company has been exceeded. Change the tariff plan for further work in EqMan.
delete_transfer_confirm: Do you really want to remove the selected inventory items from the request?
auto_accept_transfer: Do you really want to delete the selected request?
empty_transfer: Request has been created. Attention! "No confirmation" mode is enabled, which means that upon creating a request, the employee will not be required to confirm it upon receipt. To enable confirmation, go to the "Settings" tab in the Administrative Panel and enable "Confirmation mode".
